short_summary: Replacement of floating wharves at Toney river, able get used between early march and late July. Financial offer can be figured by estimated budgeted approx $43.11M. Maybe excavation constitute key method in delivery.
description: The work covered under this contract consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for the replacement of Floating Wharves at Toney River, Pictou County, Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
## Replacement of Floating Wharves - Eastside, Toney River, Nova Scotia
### Tender Information

* [Reference Number] PW-22-01015260
* [Solicitation Number] 30003737
* [Publication Date] 2022-11-30
* [Tender Closing Date] 2022-12-15T13:00:00 (expired)

#### Description of Work
The successful bidder will be required to furnish all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the replacement of floating wharves at Toney River, Eastside, Pictou County, Nova Scotia. The scope of work includes:

* Replacement of floating wharves
* Associated groundwork and environmental mitigation measures

#### Pre-Requisites
Failure to meet the following requirements will render the bidder disqualified:

* Proof of a valid (CFTA) Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) certification
* Demonstration of relevant expertise in marine construction projects

#### Procurement Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Tender Eligibility Criteria: Only bids from accredited Canadian businesses will be considered.

#### Contract Details

* Expectancy Contract Start Date: March 1st, 2023
* Expectancy Contract End Date: March 31st, 2023

### Important Links

* The entire qualification package is available on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
	+ [RFP Documents] (English and French): Pages 1-5
	+ [Addendum 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/12/1f914b3bcc17bab8cc9278c7d946fb4f/30003737_-_addendum_2.pdf)
	+ [Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/43413b17aa6769dda0fe181d751b2a45/30003737_-_addendum_1.pdf)

Contact Information

* Email: DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Address: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada
* Phone: Not Available
* Fax: Not Available
